title: SEO Best Practice
desc: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) involves optimizing your website to rank higher in search engine results pages (SERPs). Implementing best SEO practice in your HTML can improve your website’s visibility.

methods.title: Title Tags
methods.desc: Defines the title of the web page.
consider: Keep it under 60 characters.
Include relevant keywords.
Make it unique for each page.
methods.code: <title>Best Practices for SEO in HTML | YourSiteName</title>

methods.title: Meta Descriptions
methods.desc: Provides a summary of the page content.
consider: Keep it under 155 characters.
Include relevant keywords and a call-to-action.
Ensure it is unique for each page.

methods.title: Heading Tags
methods.desc: Structure content for both users and search engines.
consider: Use one h1 tag per page for the main topic.
Use h2, h3 and etc, to structure subsections.
Include keywords in headings where relevant.

methods.title: URL Structure
consider: Use descriptive, keyword-rich URLs.
Avoid complex query strings.
Use hyphens to separate words (e.g., `your-site.com/seo-best-practices`).

methods.title: Alt Text for Images
methods.desc: Describes the content of images for search engines and accessibility.
consider: Provide descriptive alt text for every image.
Include relevant keywords without keyword stuffing.

methods.title: Sitemap
methods.desc: Helps search engines understand the structure of your site.
consider: Include a link to your XML sitemap in the robots.txt file.
Ensure your sitemap is updated regularly.

methods.title: Robots Meta Tags
methods.desc: Provides instructions to search engine crawlers about indexing and following
consider: Use index, follow for pages you want to be indexed.
Use noindex for pages you don’t want to be indexed.

methods.title: Canonical Tags
methods.desc: Prevents duplicate content issues by specifying the preferred version of a page.
consider: Use on pages with similar or duplicate content.

methods.title: Mobile Optimization
methods.desc: Ensures your site is usable and accessible on mobile devices.
consider: Use responsive design techniques.
Optimize images and resources for mobile.
